He also talks about what to expect on tour with the new album, and gives us an exclusive run down of the track list. 

 

Takeaways:

  •  Jelly named it Beautiful Disaster because it felt like the vibe of the record, and he’s loved a rainy day ever since he was young. 
  • Jelly was born to make therapeutic music that heals others. It comes from a place of pain, and he lets it flow through. 
  • The goal of every album is to outdo the last album, and Jelly feels he did it with Beautiful Disaster.
  • Jelly is very empathic and feels your stories when you share them with him. He appreciates you sharing and that’s the only way we can all heal. 
  • Jelly and Bunnie’s daughter Bailee Ann really does write her own music, and they couldn’t be prouder of her contribution to the album on “If Tears Could Talk”. 
  • “Nothing Left At All” is currently Jelly’s favorite, although it changes weekly, and he can’t wait for you to see the video. 
  • Jelly wrote “Suicide” for Bunnie, and it was about time she got a dark love song. Jelly has also been very open about his struggles with depression in his past, and their love saved him from himself. 
  • The album includes 12 tracks and Tech N9ne, Krizz Kaliko, Lil Wyte, and Struggle Jennings are among the contributors. 
  • Please share the music on social media, and you can even gift people the album to check out your new favorite songs. 

 

Quotes: 

  •  “Therapeutic music has always been my vibe.” 
  • “All my music is dark, that’s the space in which I write from.” 
  • “This record was all about proving myself to myself.” 
  • “You want someone to hear it and be helped.” 
  • “People don’t put the time in to be great, so they don’t know how great they can be.” 
  • “Sometimes, you just have to embrace your own boogieman.”

item.title: 41: Libido, Squirting, and Making the Kitty Pretty with Dr. Felix
item.itunes:title: Libido, Squirting, and Making the Kitty Pretty with Dr. Felix
item.description:
Dr. Cherise Felix, MD., was so popular on the show last time that Bunnie wanted to bring her back to answer all your questions, no matter how weird and out there they are.

She talks about the expansion of her medical spa, The Service Station, including services now for men, and gives us advice about everything from IUD’s, how to revamp the sex drive after a hysterectory, menopause, and squirting.

She also shares a horror story about the craziest usage of paper towels known to man. 

 

Takeaways:

  • As an OBGYN, Dr. Felix has taken care of thousands of patients and brings both knowledge and empathy when working with their concerns about their bodies and health. 
  • The Service Station in Smyrna, TN offers everything from Body Contouring, GYN services, Laser Hair Removal, Hormone Replacement Therapy and now some services for men. It’s your place to get lifted, tucked, sucked, and just about every other service you can think of to make you the best version of yourself. 
  • Very supportive bras aren’t always the best thing for helping the boobies lift and stay up there — make sure you are also balancing it out with enough natural gravity. 
  • You can thank two glands on the side of the urethra for squirting, or female ejaculation. Some can do it easily, others have to find the sweet spot in which it occurs. 
  • If you are concerned about your libido, make sure you work with a physician to get a complete panel of your hormone levels. 
  • It’s important to also consider family history, genetics, and DNA when understanding why a miscarriage may occur. 
  • Make sure you know where your paper towel rolls are at all times, or else a doctor like Dr. Felix will have to go in and get ‘em. 

 

Quotes: 

  • “I think I’ve been perimenopausal since I was 19.” - B 
  • “I don’t think I’m a normal 40 year old, so I’ll go into menopause when I’m like 85.” - B 
  • “I’m the only Instagram model where you can’t find my vagina online.” - B
  • “At the end of all the sacrifice we made, we should be able to enjoy our life.” - Dr. Felix

 

Mentioned: 

Cherise Felix

The Service Station: Facebook | Instagram 

 

Check out Bunnie: 

@xomgitsbunnie

item.title: 40: MJ Gets Real Ratchet, Grandma Pole Dancing & Bleaching Buttholes
item.itunes:title: MJ Gets Real Ratchet, Grandma Pole Dancing & Bleaching Buttholes
item.description:
Bunnie discovered the beautiful and sexy MJ, or Madysun Jaques, on TikTok, and boy is she glad to have found her. MJ mixes her comedy with her hot body, sexy videos, and isn’t afraid to be a little ratchet as well.

MJ talks about how she got her start on TikTok, why you definitely want to sign up for her OnlyFans, her new adult entertainment career that’s about to skyrocket, and how her grandma is her biggest supporter.

She and Bunnie also share secrets on butthole management, vaginoplasties, and what celebrities MJ has had some offline fun with. 

 

Takeaways:

  • MJ lives in Myrtle Beach, but the slowish pace of the town didn’t stop her from becoming huge on social media. Her TikTok has over 300k followers with 4.1 million likes. 
  • MJ runs everything she does as a real business, including her OnlyFans account. She also recently signed with a management group for real adult entertainment videos, so expect her to blow up in that area as well. 
  • Bunnie’s advice to MJ is make sure you do everything you want to, but be sure to treat it as a business and not get lost in fame or drugs. 
  • MJ’s Grandma is one of her best friends, and takes being supportive to the next level by hand designing the outfits she wears to the strip club. 
  • Yes, MJ does bleach her butthole, and it’s not as hard as you think! 
  • MJ is open like Bunnie about having work done, and has gotten a tummy tuck, nipple reduction, vaginoplasty, and there is no arguing that the results are anything but super hot. 
  • MJ is very single and ready to mingle, and is a proud mom, so all you hot stepdads — step up! 



Quotes: 

  • “I respect my body so much that I get paid for it.”  - MJ 
  • “Your grandma can probably make money...there is grandma fetish porn.” - B
  • “When you are crying in your Camry and your husband is cheating on you with a girl like me, now what bitch?” - B 
  • “I hate dark brown bootie hole meat, it’s so gross.” - B 
  • “Celina Powell just blocked me on Instagram, she’s mad at me!” - B

item.title: 39: Catching Up with Bailee Ann
item.itunes:title: Catching Up with Bailee Ann
item.description:
The most requested and popular guest, Bailee Ann, rejoins Bunnie this week to have some fun and spill some tea! Bailee catches us up on what life in 6th grade is really like, her best advice to handle bullies, and what’s it’s really like growing up with Bunnie and Jelly as parents. She also dishes the info on her verse in Jelly’s upcoming song, when we can expect to see her on tour, and how long it will be before she joins the family and gets her own channel on YouTube. 

 

Takeaways:

  • Bunnie and Jelly have simple advice for bullies — just knock ‘em out! However, Bailee Ann subscribes to the idea that it’s good to try and ration with them first, and make sure you aren’t dealing with the situation alone. Then, if all else fails, punch them. 
  • Bailee’s music school, School of Rock, has been such a great experience and is shaping up Bailee and her band to be their very own performing rock stars. 
  • Bailee wrote her own verse to Jelly’s song, “Beautiful Disaster”, and even Bunnie couldn’t hide her poker face of how impressed she was. The song will be out Feb 21. 
  • Yes, Bailee really did wear a sweatshirt with a woman’s bare boobies on them to school, and you can thank Bunnie’s eyesight for the whole situation. 
  • Bailee is so pumped to join Jelly for some tour dates when she can, and even more excited to hang with Tech N9ne on the shows. 
  • Mark your calendar now — September 19, 2020, will be with first Dumb Blonde live podcast! Location and more details coming soon. 
  • Bunnie and Bailee both have similar stories of growing up in less than ideal situations with their mother, but it is their job to break the cycle and keep trucking while showing love and kindness for others. 
  • Just like her favorite animal the koala, Bailee and her Gemini self have a sweet side, and a side you don’t want to mess with! 
  • Let’s all encourage Bailee to get her 10 vlogs filmed and edited, so she can launch a YouTube channel already! 

 

Quotes: 

  • “Your first kiss ever was with tongue??” - B 
  • “When you have this much Botox in your face, it’s hard to smile.” - Bunnie 
  • “It’s an old saying, but I’ll throw up if I picture everyone in their underwear. Ew.” - B
  • “You’ve got to learn how to stand up for yourself, and you can’t deal with bullying alone.” - B
  • “If I had your life as a kid, I’d be Bill Gates right now.” - Bunnie 
  • “Hurt people hurt people.” - Bunnie 
  • “You gotta get a job with your family. If we have to do work all day, so do you!” - Bunnie 

 

Mentioned: 

@baileeannnnn

School of Rock 

Percy Jackson

PS, I Love You 

To All the Boys I’ve Loved Before 

@TechN9ne 

Jelly Roll: Twitter | Website | Instagram | YouTube 

 

Check out Bunnie: 

@xomgitsbunnie

item.title: 38: Internet Smokeshow Kristen Strout Talks Fast Cars and Flipping Houses
item.itunes:title: Internet Smokeshow Kristen Strout Talks Fast Cars and Flipping Houses
item.description:
Not only is Kristen Strout a beautiful woman who has won bikini and modeling contests, but this smokeshow is a tomboy at heart who can work on your car, flip your house, and then fix your toilet leak. She joins Bunnie to talk about settling into Nashville, weird stalkers, and the real price of dating a model. 

 

Takeaways:

  • Kristen grew up in Florida and is a tomboy at heart. She ran outside barefoot, played in the dirt, and is just like one of the guys minus the drop-dead gorgeous looks and killer body. 
  • Kristen always had an infatuation with Nashville, and even though she is a self described introvert, she’s settling in quite nicely. 
  • Once Kristen won her first bikini contest, she realized there was money to be made from contests and promo modeling. 
  • Kristen is a biker chick at heart, and now is the proud owner of a custom detailed C7 Corvette. 
  • Kristen has a huge passion for flipping houses and doing huge makeovers on properties. The last one, she and her fiance demoed themselves with a bunch of skill and a ton of elbow grease. 
  • Guys, take it from Bunnie and Kristen: trying to find someone’s location using instagram stories or screenshots is not attractive — it’s creepy. 
  • Expect a bunch of new beautiful work from Kristen including her very own calendar. She also has a passion for music and singing, so maybe we will get lucky and have some new tunes from her as well. 

 

Quotes: 

  • “Everyone wants to date a model, til they date a model.”
  • “I could show my labia lips and you don’t care, but if I’m cooking vegan food you all want to know the recipe.” - B
  • “I would rather put my heart on a platter for people to stomp on than my butthole.” - B

 

Mentioned: 

Instagram | Facebook

item.title: 37: TikTok Sensation TopFreakDaddy talks Tiktok Fame & Tinder Dates Gone Wrong
item.itunes:title: TikTok Sensation TopFreakDaddy talks Tiktok Fame & Tinder Dates Gone Wrong
item.description:
Sami Lane (AKA Freak Daddy) is a TikTok star, musician, producer, and badass individual. They built a Freak Daddy cult on social media to give people a safe space to be curious instead of confused about whatever is happening in their life. They join the show this week to talk about their music and upcoming album, and to share the funniest Tinder story that made them a viral sensation on TikTok. 

 

Takeaways:

  • Sami is non-binary and doesn’t associate with either gender, although they are exploring their trans masculinity. They are more comfortable not to be labeled and boxed in, and although they perform female, there are no limits or boundaries! 
  • On Sami’s podcast Impurity anything goes. They talk about anything taboo and give people a community to explore their own issues and experiences within a safe space. 
  • Sami also identifies as pansexual and doesn’t care much about gender or presentation in romantic partners. 
  • Sami is soon moving from Nashville to Portland, Oregon and we know they will do awesome at creating a new community-centred around open and accepting cool individuals. 
  • Freak Daddy produces their own music, and it’s going more in an industrial pop direction. You’ll have no choice but to dance to it when you hear it. 
  • Sami was shadowbanned on Instagram (something Bunnie can relate to) so they went over to TikTok. Their Tinder video sky-rocketed and their account now has over 240k followers with 3 million likes. 
  • Sami shares the most hilarious Tinder date story you have ever heard, that involves Adele, an engagement ring, and the two of them almost running away to New York. 

 

Quotes: 

  • “I’m constantly trying to learn, so why not try to involve everyone else in the process?” - S
  • “I’m the black sheep in the family and I’m doing the best out of all of them, so go figure.” - B
  • “Oh, we ruined Adele for me. I get triggered by Adele now because of this experience.” 

 

Mentioned: 

Impurity 

Instagram | Tik Tok | YouTube 

Freak Daddy World 

Dorian Electra

@ChellaMan

Die Antwoord

Ic3 Peak 

 

Check out Bunnie: 

@xomgitsbunnie

item.title: 36: Kenzi Lewis Talks About Being Female in a Perverted Music Industry
item.itunes:title: Kenzi Lewis Talks About Being Female in a Perverted Music Industry
item.description:
We all know Bunnie loves to scroll the ‘gram and scout for talent, and when she discovered Nashville based singer-songwriter Kenzi Lewis she couldn’t wait to share her angelic voice and great tone with you.

Kenzi joins the show to talk about being featured twice on American Idol, expose some of the dark and shady secrets in the music industry, and to perform and share the inspiration behind one of her favorite songs, “Tattooed with Bad Luck”. 

 

Takeaways:

  • Kenzi was born a performer and sang at her mom’s wedding when she was just two years old. 
  • Kenzi went to the American Idol group rounds when she was 15, and sang her heart out in front of J-Lo and Steven Tyler. 
  • Kenzi’s daughter inspires her to be a strong woman and set an example of what strength and grace look like. 
  • More than a million people have enjoyed Kenzi’s music on her YouTube, and her messages of overcoming addiction and abuse help them get through their personal struggles.

item.title: 35: Bunnie and FeFe Read Your Deepest, Darkest Confessions
item.itunes:title: Bunnie and FeFe Read Your Deepest, Darkest Confessions
item.description:
Bunnie asked for your deepest, darkest confessions and boy, did you guys deliver. She is joined with her main squeeze and co-host FeFe to read some of the juiciest, freakiest, and funniest confessions they’ve ever heard, and even give a few of their own stories along with them. Y’all never fail to amuse us. 

 

Takeaways:

  • Stripping is not a bad thing! Maybe in the 80’s it was taboo, but now it’s so mainstream that there is no need to hide it. 
  • Want to marry a country gangster? Bunnie and FeFe pulled it off, and have high hopes for you too. 
  • Some people are really that hungry for cold hard cash that they will grab it right off poo. True story, and Bunnie witnessed it firsthand. 
  • Ball tickling as a solution to snoring? Bunnie and FeFe think it would just arouse their man, but of course are open to giving it a try. 
  • You may think you’re fooling people into thinking you don’t smoke anymore, but you can always smell cigarettes. 
  • Even the happiest couple still fights, and it’s where you really get to know a person and see how they handle stress and conflict. Plus, fighting can be okay when you have great make up sex. 

 

Quotes: 

  • “I’m an alpha bitch, I run shit all day long.” 
  • “You gotta give him what he wants every now and then, and call it a night.” 
  • “This is why I don’t eat p*ssy. You never quite know what’s going on down there.” 
  • “The key to a happy marriage is to know that there is no such thing as a completely happy marriage.” 

 

Mentioned: 

FeFe King 

Jelly Roll: Twitter | Website | Instagram | YouTube

item.title: 34: Manager Meme Spills the Tea
item.itunes:title: Manager Meme Spills the Tea
item.description:
Manager Meme steps out behind the scenes and into the spotlight this week to answer all your questions and then some! She and Bunnie talk about how exactly they met and joined forces to become the dynamic duo they are today, what it’s really like to work with Bunnie as her right-hand woman behind the scenes, and more about Meme’s own career as a hairstylist and artist. 

 

Takeaways:

  • Meme is the owner of Level 13 Hair Studio in Murfreesboro, TN, and is also on the team of very talented artists and stylists at the studio. 
  • Meme is a West Coast girl at heart, something that initially proved she and Bunnie would be friends forever. 
  • Meme slid into Bunnie’s DM’s, and immediately Bunnie was impressed with her attention to detail and true artistic talent. 
  • Meme’s attention to detail and eye for angles help her make sure everything is beyond perfect for the photoshoots she does with Bunnie. 
  • If Meme and Bunnie can survive that crazy DTLA penthouse experience, they can get through anything together. 
  • For those of you wanting to make your dreams really happen, two things Bunnie and Meme recommend: make sure your home life is good before you get into boss mode, and be hungry and willing to work hard for what it is that you want. 
  • Meme and Bunnie share the same vision of 2020, even more success for Dumb Blonde thanks to you guys, plus live shows and some dope merch. 

 

Quotes: 

  • “There are grandma’s that are tatted up on the West Coast. Out here it’s like Jesus doesn’t approve.” - B
  • “I didn’t know I was going to be good at this, honestly.” - M
  • “I don’t care how beautiful you are, if you can’t get something done you are worthless to me.” - B
  • “Get my angles, shoot me right and i’m good.” - B

 

Mentioned: 

Level 13 Hair Studio

@TrishaPaytas

item.title: 33: Escort Life, Sugar Daddies, and Strip Clubs with Kimber and Ava
item.itunes:title: Escort Life, Sugar Daddies, and Strip Clubs with Kimber and Ava
item.description:
Bunnie is joined this week with two beautiful business ladies, Kimber and Ava, to talk about a subject near and dear to her heart, the world of companion services and sugar daddies. The girls break down what it’s really like to work as an escort, how they went from living on a cornfield to a dominating at strip clubs, and they shed some light on things to know before roping in a sugar daddy. 

 

Takeaways:

 

  • Bunnie got into stripping when one of her exes cheated on her with a stripper, and she knew she needed to show the world how it’s really done. 
  • In the world of working girls there is a sisterhood amongst them (at least the good ones) and they look out for each other and show one another the ropes. 
  • Some clients want their balls crushed, others want GFE, or the Girlfriend Experience. Every experience is different. 
  • Many escorts and working girls start out as strippers, and get addicted to how much money there is to make. 
  • Picturing the backstage of a strip club may seem hot, but if you saw what was really going on it’s enough to turn a straight man gay. 
  • Having a Sugar Daddy has its perks, but also there are major drawbacks. They could feel like they own you, there are no “off” days, and you may have an angry wife chasing you down the street. 
  • Kimber and Ava both have seen a different side of life as a working girl. They’ve been in some scary situations both emotionally and physically. The key is to remember the world stops for no one, and only the strong will get back out there. 
  • For girls looking to get into the industry, Kimber and Ava recommend that you find a sugar daddy or some good regulars. It’s not just about sex anymore. Also, be aware of trafficking laws and don’t be stupid online or IRL.  

 

Quotes: 

  • “If I’m dancing for you naked, it’s gonna be like a washcloth.” - B 
  • “I swear to you, I found a dollar in my ass crack like 30 minutes after I got on stage.” 
  • “A lot of dudes that have a lot of money don’t dress like they do.” 



Mentioned: 

Cheetahs Las Vegas 

The Red Rooster
Eros

@keepingupwithkimber_

 

Check out Bunnie: 

@xomgitsbunnie
